DOC.brief_summary: This study test hypothesis multivitamin supplementation give HIV+ pregnant woman Tanzania would slow disease progression enhance overall health .
DOC.detailed_description: In study , seek examine whether administration multivitamin exclude vitamin A , multivitamins include vitamin A , vitamin A alone would reduce risk perinatal transmission HIV slow rate disease progression group pregnant HIV infect woman . We also examine efficacy supplement pregnancy outcomes , risk maternal child morbidity wasting .
DOC.criteria: HIVinfected woman present antenatal care 12 27 week gestation :
